mapper.sql: MONITOR_ID as monitorId, ACCESS_NUMBER as accessNumber, MONITOR_URL as monitorURL, CASE STATE WHEN '01' THEN '在线' ELSE '报修' END as state, FUNCTION_TYPE as functionType, REL_VENUES_ID as relVenuesId, CREATOR as creator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_MODIFIER as lastModifier, LAST_MODIFY_TIME as lastModifyTime
mapper.update: update rm_monitor_manage_info set STATE=#{state}, FUNCTION_TYPE=#{functionType}, REL_VENUES_ID=#{relVenuesId}, LAST_MODIFIER=#{lastModifier}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME= #{lastModifyTime} where MONITOR_ID=#{monitorId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(MONITOR_ID) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN STATE =01 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS on_line, SUM(CASE WHEN STATE =02 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REPAIR FROM rm_monitor_manage_info
SELECT monitor_url FROM rm_monitor_manage_info WHERE access_number=#{accessNumber}
